GOVERNMENT OF INDIA
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY
'A' WING, JANPATH BHAWAN, JANPATH

NEW DELHI - 110001

No. CAS- 25 (2A)/2004. Div. I Dated: 13/01/2017

CORRIGENDUM-3 TO CIRCULAR NO. 25/2004

Sub: Minimum Standards for Civil Aviation Security Equipment.

In terms of Rule 3 (b) of the Aircraft (Security) Rules, 2011, DG, BCAS
in partial modification to AVSEC Circular No. 25/2004 dated 27/12/2004.
hereby makes the following changes in Appendix 'J’.

SPECIFICATION FOR EXPLOSIVE VAPOUR DETECTORS (EVD)
Para 2.11 Weight (Hand Unit) : Less than 2 kg
may be read as

"Para 2.11 weight (Hand Unit) : less than 5 kg".

-R: Oandiuia

Director General, BCAS
New Delhi

Distribution: As per standard list.
